Description: Breil men's universe chronograph watch tw1077     Item Description About Us Payment Shipping Returns Contact Us     Style and sophistication. The look of the watch is polished and clean while it reveals an advanced and complex construction. This design heritage allows breil to “orchestrate” the fusion of different materials to create an effortlessly stylish timepiece. This watch is made from black ion plated steel and is fastened by a white rubber strap. It has a white dial with a date function. Watch comes with 2 year manufacturers guarantee. Also come with official breil presentation box and instruction manual. Shipping to the UK I send out by first class recorded mail so usually you will receive order next day. It can take up to 3 days though Royal mail Express next day 1pm and 9am delivery is available for an extra charge. Shipping to the E.U We use royal mail international signed for and the delivery aim for this service is 3 days. Shipping to the rest of the world We use royal mail international signed for and the delivery aim for this service is 5 days. Recorded delivery All Recorded items that we send out require signature on delivery. Tracking numbers will be sent to the customer on request. Online tracking for UK & Northern Ireland customers is available at www.royalmail.com. We only accept returns if item is returned as new with all original packaging we sent it out to you with.
